page.title: 07MARTELLO CAMP
page.content: There are about 750 caravans in this camp.The Martello camp is about 35 years old.5,000 people come here every year.In the middle of the site is the Martello Tower which is 180 years old, this tower does not get in the way of the caravan camp.The tourists like it here,many come back and rebook.The season lasts from March 1st to October 31st.When the caravans are 10 years old the camp sell them and gets new ones.There is a swimming pool and lots of other entertainment like bars,shops and amusment arcades.The Martello Tower is used as a bar.
